readme:
# ion-menu-button

Menu Button is component that automatically creates the icon and functionality to open a menu on a page.
docs: Menu Button is component that automatically creates the icon and functionality to open a menu on a page.

docsTags.text: {"ios" | "md"} mode - The mode determines which platform styles to use.
docsTags.name: virtualProp

docsTags.text: native - The native HTML button element that wraps all child elements.
docsTags.name: part

docsTags.text: icon - The menu button icon (uses ion-icon).
docsTags.name: part

props.name: autoHide
props.docs: Automatically hides the menu button when the corresponding menu is not active

props.name: color
props.docs:
The color to use from your application's color palette.
Default options are: `"primary"`, `"secondary"`, `"tertiary"`, `"success"`, `"warning"`, `"danger"`, `"light"`, `"medium"`, and `"dark"`.
For more information on colors, see [theming](/docs/theming/basics).

props.name: disabled
props.docs: If `true`, the user cannot interact with the menu button.

props.name: menu
props.docs: Optional property that maps to a Menu's `menuId` prop. Can also be `start` or `end` for the menu side. This is used to find the correct menu to toggle

props.name: mode
props.docs: The mode determines which platform styles to use.

styles.name: --background-focused
styles.docs: Background of the menu button when focused with the tab key

styles.name: --background-focused-opacity
styles.docs: Opacity of the menu button background when focused with the tab key

styles.name: --background-hover
styles.docs: Background of the menu button on hover

styles.name: --background-hover-opacity
styles.docs: Opacity of the background on hover

styles.name: --border-radius
styles.docs: Border radius of the menu button

styles.name: --color-focused
styles.docs: Color of the menu button when focused with the tab key

styles.name: --color-hover
styles.docs: Color of the menu button on hover

styles.name: --padding-end
styles.docs: Right padding if direction is left-to-right, and left padding if direction is right-to-left of the button

styles.name: --padding-start
styles.docs: Left padding if direction is left-to-right, and right padding if direction is right-to-left of the button

parts.name: native
parts.docs: The native HTML button element that wraps all child elements.
